title: Afghan American activists explain how to help refugees as they arrive in the U.S.
content:
1. Afghan American activists explain how to help refugees as they arrive in the U.S.  Yahoo News
  2. Afghanistan: What's next for those who stayed? | The Stream  Al Jazeera English
  3. Afghan refugees face uncertain future after evacuation  CBS Evening News
  4. Opinion | Afghan refugees will know indifference, bigotry — and also kindness — in America. They will also make it better.  The Washington Post
  5. EU's hard Afghan slog may perish due to 'Fortress Europe'  EUobserver
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
